law.text: The District Court shall make settlements with personal representatives, assignees, conservators, curators, and guardians in his county.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 25, sec. 115, effective July 15, 2014. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 111, effective July 1, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 12, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 368, effective January 2, 1978.
